org.pac4j.core.exception

Class HttpAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.pac4j.core.exception.HttpAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HttpAction
extends Exception
    This exception is thrown when an additional HTTP action (redirect, basic auth...) is required.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
